findings.title: Potential Reentrancy
findings.description: External call executes before storage write. If the callee re-enters, contract state may be manipulated before completion. Risk amplifiers detected: multiple external calls occur before the first state write; external calls use dynamic or over-privileged call flags; execution reaches deep internal call-chain depth before state effects.
findings.recommendation: Apply checks-effects-interactions ordering and explicit reentrancy lock for methods performing external calls.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=5, avg_complexity=5.00, peak_complexity=5, uncertainty=0.594, penalty=0.148, confidence 0.900->0.752.

findings.title: Unchecked Arithmetic Operation
findings.description: Operation ADD may overflow or underflow without runtime guard.
findings.recommendation: Validate arithmetic bounds or assert invariants before state updates.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=5, avg_complexity=5.00, peak_complexity=5, uncertainty=0.594, penalty=0.148, confidence 0.800->0.652.

findings.title: Missing Access Control
findings.description: Sensitive operations execute without Runtime.CheckWitness or equivalent guard.
findings.recommendation: Enforce authorization for state-changing and privileged methods.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration retained baseline confidence 0.850; no symbolic constraints were observed.

findings.title: Over-Privileged External Call Flags
findings.description: External call uses CallFlags.All (0x0F), enabling full callee capabilities.
findings.recommendation: Reduce call flags to the minimum required permissions (least privilege).
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration retained baseline confidence 0.850; no symbolic constraints were observed.

findings.title: Dynamic External Contract Target
findings.description: System.Contract.Call receives a non-concrete contract hash at runtime.
findings.recommendation: Validate contract hashes against explicit allowlists before performing external calls.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=5, avg_complexity=5.00, peak_complexity=5, uncertainty=0.594, penalty=0.148, confidence 0.900->0.752.

findings.title: Insecure Upgradeability Path
findings.description: Contract exposes upgrade/destroy behavior without strong authorization checks.
findings.recommendation: Protect update/destroy methods using strict witness checks and preferably multisig governance.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration retained baseline confidence 0.850; no symbolic constraints were observed.

findings.title: Unchecked External Call Return Value
findings.description: Result of external call 'CALLT:deserialize' is not validated before continuing.
findings.recommendation: Check return values and revert/abort on failure.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration retained baseline confidence 0.700; no symbolic constraints were observed.

findings.title: Unchecked External Call Return Value
findings.description: Result of external call 'CALLT:deserialize' is not validated before continuing.
findings.recommendation: Check return values and revert/abort on failure.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=3, avg_complexity=5.00, peak_complexity=5, uncertainty=0.427, penalty=0.107, confidence 0.700->0.593.

findings.title: Late Authorization Check
findings.description: Authorization check occurs after at least one sensitive operation.
findings.recommendation: Run Runtime.CheckWitness before state changes or external calls.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=3, avg_complexity=5.00, peak_complexity=5, uncertainty=0.427, penalty=0.107, confidence 0.850->0.743.

findings.title: Single Admin Control
findings.description: Critical operations are gated by a single witness check.
findings.recommendation: Use multisig governance and optional timelock for sensitive methods.
findings.confidence_reason: Static confidence baseline 0.700; no execution-path uncertainty context.

findings.title: Unchecked External Call Return Value
findings.description: Result of external call 'CALLT:serialize' is not validated before continuing.
findings.recommendation: Check return values and revert/abort on failure.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=5, avg_complexity=5.00, peak_complexity=5, uncertainty=0.594, penalty=0.148, confidence 0.700->0.552.

findings.title: Potential Unbounded Loop
findings.description: Execution path depth=128 with loop back-edges detected.
findings.recommendation: Add bounded iteration checks and short-circuit exit conditions.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=5, avg_complexity=5.00, peak_complexity=5, uncertainty=0.594, penalty=0.148, confidence 0.700->0.552.

findings.title: High GAS Consumption Path
findings.description: Execution path consumes approximately 66650 gas units.
findings.recommendation: Reduce expensive syscalls/loops and split heavy workflows.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=5, avg_complexity=5.00, peak_complexity=5, uncertainty=0.594, penalty=0.148, confidence 0.700->0.552.

findings.title: Overly Broad Manifest Permissions
findings.description: Manifest allows unrestricted contract/method calls, expanding the callable trust surface.
findings.recommendation: Restrict manifest permissions to explicit contract hashes and method names.
findings.confidence_reason: Static confidence baseline 0.700; no execution-path uncertainty context.
